pr_title: [NCL-5703] Add Javadocs to constants and enums

timeline.bodyText: Why the dot at the end?
timeline.author: thescouser89
thescouser89
thescouser89
thescouser89
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -20,6 +20,7 @@
 /**
  * Contains the various possible support levels, such as UNRELEASED, SUPPORTED, EOL, etc..
  *
+ * Rome wasn't built in a day, nor is PNC. This feature will come in near future.

timeline.message: [NCL-5703] Add Javadocs to constants and enums

timeline.bodyText: Status of the process of milestone closing.

diff --git a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/MilestoneCloseStatus.java b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/MilestoneCloseStatus.java
index 5237d506e..ecf961c55 100644
--- a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/MilestoneCloseStatus.java
+++ b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/MilestoneCloseStatus.java

@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
 package org.jboss.pnc.enums;
 
 /**
- * Status of the process of mileston closing.
+ * Status of the process of milestone closing.
  *
  * Author: Michal Szynkiewicz, michal.l.szynkiewicz@gmail.com Date: 8/30/16 Time: 1:16 PM
  */

timeline.bodyText: A Docker-formatted image will be used to create a container where to run the build.
timeline.author: vibe13
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,13 +24,19 @@
  */
 public enum SystemImageType {
 
-    /** A Docker image will be used to run the build */
+    /**
+     * A Docker image will be used to run the build.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/SystemImageType.java b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/SystemImageType.java
index c1b60c37b..5bb9d0d81 100644
--- a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/SystemImageType.java
+++ b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/SystemImageType.java

@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@ package org.jboss.pnc.enums;
 public enum SystemImageType {
 
     /**
-     * A Docker image will be used to run the build.
+     * A Docker-formatted image that will be used to create a container where to run the build.
      */
     DOCKER_IMAGE,

timeline.bodyText: It looks like the "The operation was successful" doc is for all three statuses in the line.
timeline.author: matejonnet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,13 @@
  */
 package org.jboss.pnc.enums;
 
+/**
+ * Status of generic result of some operation or task.
+ */
 public enum ResultStatus {
+    /**
+     * The operation was successful.
+     */
     SUCCESS(true), FAILED(false), SYSTEM_ERROR(false);

replies.bodyText:
What should be the descriptions for the two other states? Without description the formatter puts it on one line.
cc @michalovjan
replies.author: janinko

replies.bodyText: +1 these two should be documented as well
replies.author: jbartece

replies.bodyText:
The operation failed. for FAILED and The operation failed unexpectedly. for SYSTEM_ERROR?
Enums are used for reporting status during temp. build cleaning process.
replies.author: michalovjan

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/ResultStatus.java b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/ResultStatus.java
index a74ed7ca9..d6e99ba9d 100644
--- a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/ResultStatus.java
+++ b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/ResultStatus.java

@@ -24,7 +24,15 @@ public enum ResultStatus {
     /**
      * The operation was successful.
      */
-    SUCCESS(true), FAILED(false), SYSTEM_ERROR(false);
+    SUCCESS(true),
+    /**
+     * The operation failed.
+     */
+    FAILED(false),
+    /**
+     * The operation failed unexpectedly.
+     */
+    SYSTEM_ERROR(false);
 
     private boolean success;

timeline.message: [NCL-5703] Add Javadocs to constants and enums

timeline.author: michalovjan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,9 +18,33 @@
 package org.jboss.pnc.enums;
 
 /**
+ * Status of a push of a build to Koji.
  *
  * @author Honza Brázdil <jbrazdil@redhat.com>
  */
 public enum BuildPushStatus {
-    ACCEPTED, SUCCESS, REJECTED, FAILED, SYSTEM_ERROR, CANCELED;
+    /**
+     * Push was accepted and is in progress.
+     */
+    ACCEPTED,
+    /**
+     * Build was successfuly pushed to Koji.
+     */
+    SUCCESS,
+    /**
+     * Push was rejected for some reason.
+     */
+    REJECTED,
+    /**
+     * Push failed becasue of user-side issue.
+     */
+    FAILED,
+    /**
+     * Push failed because of server-side issue.
+     */
+    SYSTEM_ERROR,
+    /**
+     * Push was canceled.

--- a/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/BuildPushStatus.java
+++ b/constants/src/main/java/org/jboss/pnc/enums/BuildPushStatus.java

@@ -36,7 +36,7 @@ public enum BuildPushStatus {
      */
     REJECTED,
     /**
-     * Push failed becasue of user-side issue.
+     * Push failed because of user-side issue.
      */
     FAILED,
     /**
